fishbowl.title: Title
fishbowl.introductionLabel: I want to start the fishbowl giving an introduction
fishbowl.introductionTooltip: You can start the Fishbowl with an introduction and you will have the option of sharing your screen. When you finish the intro, you can allow attendees to join the conversation.
fishbowl.isPrivate: I want this event to be private
fishbowl.passwordTooltip: Participants will be required to enter the password in order to access the event

validation.title: Invalid title. Please insert a conversation topic
validation.date: Format of the date is invalid: dd/mm/yyyy
validation.passwordLength: The password must have 6 characters or more
validation.fishbowlPasswordLength: The password must have 8 characters or more
validation.terms: You must accept the terms and conditions
validation.url: This is not a valid url
validation.twitter: The twitter username should start with @
validation.equalPassword: The two passwords must be equal
validation.unknownErrorServer: Unknown problem. Please refresh the page and try again.
validation.unknownErrorInside: Sorry! An error occurred while accessing. Please try again.

worldCafe.questionsTooltip: Make sure to prepare enough questions for the number of people participating. The optimal size for rooms is between 4 and 6 participants.
worldCafe.add5MinutesLabel: Add 5 extra minutes to the first round
worldCafe.add5MinutesTooltip: We recommend adding 5 extra minutes to the first round, as people usually need a bit more time to get started.
